welcome.title: Welcome to AI Sports Edge
welcome.description: Turn your sports knowledge into winning bets with the power of AI. Our users are beating the odds by up to 15% compared to traditional betting.

aiPredictions.title: AI-Powered Predictions
aiPredictions.description: Our AI analyzes millions of data points to spot value bets that humans miss. See exactly where bookmakers have set odds that don't match real probabilities—giving you a statistical edge on every bet.

liveOdds.title: Live Betting Odds
liveOdds.description: Never miss the best odds again! Our real-time comparison shows you exactly where to place your bet for maximum returns. Users who follow our odds recommendations increase their potential winnings by an average of 12%.

performance.title: Track Your Performance
performance.description: Watch your betting success grow! Track your performance against AI predictions, learn from personalized insights, and see your ROI increase over time. Users who follow our system consistently outperform their previous betting results.

getStarted.title: Ready to Start?
getStarted.description: Ready to start winning smarter? Set up your personalized betting profile in just 2 minutes and make your next bet your best bet! Join thousands of bettors who are already using data to beat the bookmakers.

completion.title: Onboarding Complete
completion.message: You can replay this feature tour anytime from Settings > App Tour & Help > Replay Feature Tour

aiPredictions.title: Find Value Where Others Don't
aiPredictions.description: Our AI doesn't just predict winners—it finds VALUE. See exactly where the bookmakers have set odds that don't match the real probabilities.
aiPredictions.hint: Users who follow our AI picks see a 15% higher win rate on average.

realTimeOdds.title: Never Miss the Best Odds Again
realTimeOdds.description: Watch odds move in real-time across all major sportsbooks. Get alerts when there's value to be found.
realTimeOdds.hint: Getting the best odds on every bet can increase your returns by up to 12% with no additional risk.

performanceDashboard.title: Your Betting Command Center
performanceDashboard.description: Track performance over time, see where you're making and losing money, and get AI-powered suggestions to improve.
performanceDashboard.hint: Users who regularly check their dashboard improve their ROI by 8% on average.

personalizedInsights.title: Your Personal Betting Analyst
personalizedInsights.description: Receive custom insights based on your favorite teams, betting history, and preferences.
personalizedInsights.hint: Personalized insights help users spot 23% more valuable betting opportunities.

premiumFeatures.title: Unlock Your Maximum Advantage
premiumFeatures.description: Preview our premium tools like parlay optimizers, prop bet analyzers, and weather impact analysis.
premiumFeatures.hint: Premium users report 22% higher returns than betting on their own.

completion.title: Tour Completed
completion.message: You've completed the feature tour! You can replay it anytime from Settings > App Tour & Help > Replay Feature Tour.

skip.title: Skip Tour
skip.message: Are you sure you want to skip the feature tour? You can replay it anytime from Settings.

items.replayFeatureTourDesc: Take a guided tour of the app's features

accessibility.chartNavigation: Use arrow keys to navigate between data points
accessibility.chartDetails: Press Enter or Space to hear details about the selected data point
accessibility.heatmapSummary: This heatmap shows activity frequency over time
accessibility.bubbleChartSummary: This bubble chart shows data points with varying sizes
accessibility.lineChartSummary: This line chart shows trends over time
accessibility.barChartSummary: This bar chart compares values across categories
accessibility.pieChartSummary: This pie chart shows the proportion of each category

heatmap.accessibilityLabel: Activity heatmap. Use arrow keys to navigate between days.
heatmap.accessibilityHint: A heatmap showing activity frequency over time
heatmap.keyboardHint: Press Enter or Space to hear details about the selected day.
heatmap.accessibleSummary: This heatmap shows {{totalActivities}} activities over {{activeDays}} active days out of {{totalDays}} total days. The most active day was {{mostActiveDate}}.

bubble.accessibilityLabel: Bubble chart. Use arrow keys to navigate between bubbles.
bubble.accessibilityHint: A bubble chart showing data points with varying sizes
bubble.keyboardHint: Press Enter or Space to hear details about the selected bubble.
bubble.accessibleSummary: This bubble chart shows {{totalItems}} items. The largest item is {{largestItem}} with a value of {{largestValue}}.

historical.accessibilityLabel: Historical trends chart. Use arrow keys to navigate between data points.
historical.accessibilityHint: A line chart showing trends over time
historical.keyboardHint: Press Enter or Space to hear details about the selected data point.
historical.accessibleSummary: This chart shows {{metric}} trends over time. The highest value is {{highestValue}} on {{highestDate}}.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.signUpFailed: Sign up failed. Please try again.
errors.emailInUse: This email is already in use. Please use a different one.
errors.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Use at least 6 characters.
errors.accountDisabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

payment.title: Payment Information
payment.subtitle: Enter your card details to subscribe to {{planName}}
payment.secureInfo: Your payment information is secure and encrypted

success.title: Subscription Successful
success.message: Your subscription has been activated successfully!

errors.generic: An error occurred during payment processing

subscription.title: Choose a Subscription Plan
subscription.subtitle: Get access to premium AI-powered betting insights
subscription.alreadySubscribed: You already have an active subscription. You can manage your subscription in the settings.

group.title: Looking for a Group Plan?
group.description: Share premium features with friends or family. Get Pro access for up to 3 users for just $149.99/month.

oddsComparison.title: Odds Comparison
oddsComparison.subtitle: Compare odds between DraftKings and FanDuel for NBA games

errors.apiFailure: Failed to load odds data. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.noData: Could not find odds for DraftKings or FanDuel at this time.

alerts.title: Odds Movement Alerts
alerts.noAlertsSubtext: You'll be notified when odds change significantly

accessibility.sortOptionHint: Changes the display order of odds
accessibility.selectSportHint: Changes odds comparison to show {{sport}} odds
